turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Klettermaxe (1952 film).
turn.2: Klettermaxe (1952 film)  Klettermaxe is a 1952 West German comedy crime film directed by Kurt Hoffmann and starring Liselotte Pulver, Albert Lieven and Charlott Daudert.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: It is a remake of a 1927 silent film about a cat burglar who steals from other thieves and a young Cuban dancer who becomes fascinated by him.
turn.6: It was shot at the Wandsbek Studios in Hamburg.
turn.8: The film's sets were designed by Willi Herrmann and Heinrich Weidemann.
turn.10: It was a major commercial success on release, and helped to cement Pulver's reputation as a leading star.
